name: Capivaras Headbut
description:
Its Headbut time!!!

Capivaras Headbut is a party game where you control a capybara and need to defend its dominance on top of a rock, for that, you must take down the opposing capybaras, controlled by up to 4 players in the same battle.

Developed by nathan schneider and Matheus Petrus.
